titleStmt.title: Ireland. By the Commissioners of the Common-wealth of England for the Affairs of Ireland. Whereas the said Commissioners are informed, that many officers and souldiers who have faithfully served the Common-wealth in Ireland are seduced (by the insinuations of covetous minded persons who (for luckre sake) lye in wait to purchase the poor souldiers dearly earned wages) to make sale of their debenturs ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Commissioners of the Common-wealth of England for the Affairs of Ireland.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in: Library Company of Philadelphia.
